Table of Contents

  • Top toolbar : move, zoom, reset

  • SubPlots : T, Q, O3

top ToolBar



  • See http://matplotlib.org/users/navigation_toolbar.html for Home, Back, Forward, Subplots and Save icon.

  • Move L/R: One screen left, left, 10% screen right, One screen right

  • Move U/D: One level up One level down

subplot T

  • Y : 44 to 101 levels of pressure (from 1040.0 to 0.005 hPa)

  • X : principal component number (1 to N)

  • k : (pcscore /K

subplot Q

  • Y : 44 to 101 levels of pressure (from 1040.0 to 0.005 hPa)

  • X : principal component number (1 to N)

  • k : (pcscore) /ppmv

subplot O3

  • Y : 44 to 101 levels of pressure (from 1040.0 to 0.005 hPa)

  • X : principal component (1 to N)

  • k : (pcscore) /ppmv
